effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.

short_effect.x_y: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.x_y: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.
